function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure effects of the environment may directly impact infection","Impact":"Increased risk of infection from environmental exposure","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce environmental exposure such as improved ventilation and air filtration","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with high-efficiency filters","People":"General public, especially those in densely populated areas","Owner":"Government, building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Unreliable estimates of infection rates due to testing variations and early data collection","Impact":"Inaccurate understanding of infection rates and risk factors","Mitigation":"Standardizing testing protocols and data collection methods, updating data with more recent information","Technologies":"Data analysis tools and software, standardized testing protocols","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Difficulties in detecting relationships between physical environments, exposures, behaviors, and health outcomes","Impact":"Limited ability to understand how built and natural environments impact disease severity and mortality","Mitigation":"Increased granularity in data collection, utilization of advanced data analysis techniques","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools, machine learning algorithms for data analysis","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Government, research institutions, urban planning organizations"}]}
